content: rs place marker to mark the rs of your work - k1 *brk1 sl1yo* repeat to the last 2 stitches brk1 k1 repeat row 2 and 3 until you knit desired length and loosely cast-off i recommend you measure your head circumference and knit your headband 4 cm shorter here is a short video that will help you to sew your headband https //youtu be/pbm7ktc0hbs please remember that some yarn is more stretchy than other so it is always better to sew your finished piece loosely and try it on this pattern was created by dominika penduzzu instagram @pendu creativeblog e-mail dpendu studio@gmail com youtube https //www youtube com/@dpendu/ do not copy resell or redistribute this pattern in digital or printed form please respect that this pattern was created only for your personal use or for your small-scale business use but only to make a finished product giving credit to the designer in this context small-scale business is defined as your personal retail business with 1 or 2 employees selling finished knitted products done majority or entirely in-house i love to see your creations please share them with #lidoheadband #penduknit 2
